summary: This is my first mod, so don\'t get mad at me because you think it\'s awful. Just something small I made, It\'s a unique Silver Sword called \"Sword of Vigilance\". It\'s nothing special, no retexture, just a Silver Sword with better stats and an enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
You can find it at Reachwind Eyrie, laying on a rock next to the conveniently placed blood patch and 
noticeably dead Werewolf. Is it Lore-friendly? Yes, I suppose so. But you can make up it\'s back story, make it seem mysterious.


STATS


A base damage of 15, Fire Damage for 25 points lasting for 4 seconds - this has a huge amount of charge so don\'t worry about bringing soul gems with you. And it also have the Silver Sword\'s ability to do extra damage to undead. This weapon is a bit OP, I\'m just saying.


INSTALLATION


Use the Nexus Mod Manager, it\'s just easier, ok?
author: PorkiousMaximus
